reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 439/98: TAX RATES UNDER SECTION 21.1 OF THE ACT
reg_info.reg_name_text: Tax Rates Under Section 21.1 of the Act
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 439/98: TAX RATES UNDER SECTION 21.1 OF THE ACT
reg_info.act_under: Provincial Land Tax Act   Loi sur l’impôt foncier provincial

content.content: 1. This Regulation prescribes the tax rates for the purposes of subsection 21.1 (3) of the Act.  O. Reg. 439/98, s. 1; O. Reg. 347/99, s. 1; O. Reg. 362/00, s. 1; O. Reg. 175/07, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 1. This Regulation prescribes the tax rates for the purposes of subsection 21.1 (3) of the Act.  O. Reg. 439/98, s. 1; O. Reg. 347/99, s. 1; O. Reg. 362/00, s. 1; O. Reg. 175/07, s. 2.

content.content:
6. (1) The tax rates set out in Table 5 to this Regulation are prescribed for 2006, 2007 and 2008 for the territories set out in that Table for the residential property class and the multi-residential property class, as prescribed under the Assessment Act.  O. Reg. 97/06, s. 1; O. Reg. 175/07, s. 4 (1); O. Reg. 104/08, s. 1 (1). (2) The tax rate equal to 25 per cent of the tax rate for the residential property class set out opposite the name of a territory in Table 5 to this Regulation is prescribed for 2006, 2007 and 2008 as the tax rate for that territory for the farm property class and the managed forests property class, as prescribed under the Assessment Act.  O. Reg. 97/06, s. 1; O. Reg. 175/07, s. 4 (2); O. Reg. 104/08, s. 1 (2). Tables 1-4 Revoked:  O. Reg. 175/07, s. 5. content.raw_html:
6. (1) The tax rates set out in Table 5 to this Regulation are prescribed for 2006, 2007 and 2008 for the territories set out in that Table for the residential property class and the multi-residential property class, as prescribed under the Assessment Act.  O. Reg. 97/06, s. 1; O. Reg. 175/07, s. 4 (1); O. Reg. 104/08, s. 1 (1).

(2) The tax rate equal to 25 per cent of the tax rate for the residential property class set out opposite the name of a territory in Table 5 to this Regulation is prescribed for 2006, 2007 and 2008 as the tax rate for that territory for the farm property class and the managed forests property class, as prescribed under the Assessment Act.  O. Reg. 97/06, s. 1; O. Reg. 175/07, s. 4 (2); O. Reg. 104/08, s. 1 (2).

Tables 1-4 Revoked:  O. Reg. 175/07, s. 5.
